name: Wizard Wizard Wizard
description:
Control a group of wizards with unique spells in order to escape a dungeon.

  • A/D -> Move
  • W/Space -> Jump
  • Left Mouse Button -> Cast spell
  • R -> Restart
  • Esc -> Back to menu
  • F4 -> Toggle fullscreen

Made for the Kiwi Jam using Gamemaker Studio 2, Beepbox and BFXR.
